# Введение в R {#rintro}

```{r pkgs}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r df_simple_reg}
tibble(
  x = rnorm(50, 100, 15),
  y = 8 + 3.4 * x + rnorm(50, 0, 30)
) -> simple_reg
```

```{r simple_reg_figure}
simple_reg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              size = 2,
              se = FALSE,
              color = "red3")
```

```{r simple_reg_lm}
fit <- lm(y ~ x, simple_reg)
summary(fit)
```
